listing.description: We are pleased to offer to the market an established buy to let property offering a great return on investment and an opportunity to develop (stpp) further.Interested parties are asked to enquire within. Cash buyers required.Proof of funds will be required.Pease contact us for further details.NoticePlease note we have not tested any apparatus, fixtures, fittings, or services. Interested parties must undertake their own investigation into the working order of these items. All measurements are approximate and photographs provided for guidance only.

listing.description: A well established, family run residential care home registered to provide care for up to 4 registered service users in the category of Mental Disorder (MD) â€“ Female Adult Only. The Freehold property is a semi detached two storey building, within a residential area of Tottenham in London. Accommodation is provided in 4 double en suite bedrooms, comfortable communal lounge, Kitchen / dining area, 1 staff toilet/shower room and separate staff office. There is an attractive communal garden to the rear of the property.
listing.short_description: The home is a Victorian semi-detached built property over two floors renovated to a high standard 5 years ago, double glazing throughout. The ground floor comprises 2 double en suite bedrooms, Kitchen / dining area. The first floor comprises 2 further double bedrooms (with en-suite facilities), communal lounge and Staff Office. All bedrooms are equipped with TV Aerial and Telephone points. There is a communal garden to the rear.

listing.letting_fees: Lettings fees information. The asking rent does not include letting fees. Depending on your circumstances and the property you select, following upfront fees may apply: General administration fees / Reference fees (including credit checks, bank, guarantor, previous landlords, etc) / Application fees / Fees for drawing up tenancy agreements / Inventory fees, including check-in and check-out fees / Guarantor arrangement/application fees / Additional occupant fees / Pets disclaimer fees or additional pet deposit. Fees may be changed on a per property or per tenancy basis.

listing.short_description:
* Six Bedroom Terraced House * Through Lounge * Fitted Kitchen * First Floor Bathroom And Ground Floor Cloakroom * Loft Conversion With Kitchenette And Shower Room * Garden With Gated Side Entrance * Lean-To * Downhill's Park Area * Gas Central Heating (Untested) * Energy Rating: E

Entrance

Via double glazed door to:

Hallway

Laminate flooring, radiator and staircase to first floor.

Through Lounge (24'6 x 10'6)

Double glazed windows to front bay, double radiator, laminate flooring, double glazed window to rear, single radiator and under stairs storage cupboard.

Cloakroom / Wc

Low level flush WC, hand wash basin, ceramic tiled flooring, half tiled walls, double window to side aspect, extractor fan and radiator.

Kitchen (16'9 x 8'9)

Range of fitted base and wall units, stainless steel single drainer sink unit with mixer tap and cupboards under, extractor fan, ceramic tiled flooring, radiator, double glazed windows to side aspect, double glazed window to rear bay, double glazed door to garden, part tiled walls, Ferolli wall mounted gas boiler (untested).

First Floor

Bedroom One (11'0 x 10'9)

Double glazed window to front aspect, radiator and laminate flooring.

Bedroom Four (7'9 x 6'9)

Double glazed window to front aspect, radiator and laminate flooring.

Bedroom Two (12'3 x 11'0)

Double glazed window to rear aspect, radiator and laminate flooring.

Bathroom/ Wc

White suite comprising panelled enclosed bath with mixer taps and shower attachment, pedestal hand wash basin, low level flush WC, ceramic tiled flooring, half tiled walls, double glazed window to side aspect and radiator.

Bedroom Three (9'0 x 8'9)

Double glazed window to rear bay, laminate flooring and radiator.

Landing

Staircase to:

Second Floor

Bedroom Five (9'0 x 7'0)

Double glazed window to rear aspect and radiator.

Shower Room/ Wc

White suite comprising fully tiled walls, ceramic tiled flooring, shower cubicle, hand wash basin, low level flush WC and extractor fan.

Bedroom Six (17'0 x 13'0)

Velux window to front aspect and storage into eaves.

Open Plan Fitted Kitchen

Recently fitted with oven and hob and extractor hood.

Exterior

Gardens to Front and Rear.

Rear Garden (29'6 x 17'4)

Ceramic floor area with Lean-To above, partly laid to lawn, plants to border, patio area to rear and tunnelled side entrance.

listing.description: Castles present this incredibly spacious 4/5 bedroom 'end of terrace' house. The house is situated directly opposite Downhills Park and has a paved drive with off street parking for two cars, in addition to a huge double garage at the rear (that easily fits another two cars). Other features include: 4/5 bedrooms, two bathrooms, two reception rooms, kitchen, 50ft garden with huge double garage and rear access.  Transport links are superb with Turnpike Lane tube station (Piccadilly Line - Zone -3) being just a short walk away.    EPC: D
listing.short_description: Castles present this incredibly spacious 4/5 bedroom 'end of terrace' house. The house is situated directly opposite Downhills Park and has a paved drive with off street parking for two cars, in addition to a huge double garage at the rear (that easily fits another two cars).

listing.description: Paul Simon offer For Sale this traditional 1930#s three bedroom family house situated between three parks. This stunning property offers over 1152Sq. Ft/107 Sq. M. Upon entering the ground floor there is a bright and airy through lounge which leads into an extended kitchen diner. As you head upstairs there's a spacious first floor family bathroom and three bedrooms. The loft space offers massive scope to extend for that forth bedroom! The rear garden is well maintained with a single garage to rear.The splendid green spaces of Downhill's Park are opposite to the street with access to both Lordship Recreation grounds and Belmont Park. Turnpike Lane tube station (Piccadilly Line) is also nearby, making this a wonderful purchase for a professional couple/family. The property is within catchment for Belmont Primary School.Front Garden    Paved area.Entrance Hall    Porch entrance to front door: Double radiator, carpeted flooring and under stairs cupboard.Through Lounge    Single radiator, carpeted flooring, double glazed bay to front and double radiator.Kitchen Dining Room    Base mounted units, wall mounted cupboards, electric oven & gas hob with extractor, stainless steel sink with drainer, double glazed window to rear aspect, breakfast bar, double glazed double doors to rear aspect, Vaillant boiler and tiled walls. Space for washing machine, fridge freezer and dish washer.Landing    Loft access with pull down ladder. Loft is boarded.Master Bedroom    Double glazed bay window to front aspect, wooden laminate flooring and single radiator.Bedroom Two    Double glazed window to rear aspect, wooden laminate flooring and single radiatorBedroom Three    Double glazed window to front aspect, wooden laminate flooring and single radiatorBathroom    Double glazed window to rear aspect, panel bath with shower attachment, pedestal with wash hand basin, low level w.C, wooden laminated flooring, cupboard, heated towel rail and tiled walls.Garage    Single garage to rear of property. The garage can be accessed via a service road to the rear.Rear Garden    Patio area, mature lawn and shrub borders.
listing.short_description: Paul Simon offer For Sale this traditional 1930#s three bedroom family house situated between three parks. This stunning property offers over 1152Sq. Ft/107 Sq. M. Upon entering the ground floor there is a bright and airy through lounge which leads into an extended kitchen diner. (contd...)

listing.description: Set close to the local shops and amenities this excellent three bedroom property offers a spacious double reception room, separate dining room, well appointed kitchen, and three double bedrooms as well as private garden.The property benefits from being close to the shops, bars, and amenities of Tottenham as well as the multiple transport links via Seven Sisters.
listing.short_description: Set close to the local shops and amenities this excellent three bedroom property offers a spacious double reception room, separate dining room, well appointed kitchen, and three double bedrooms as well as private garden. The property benefits from being close to the shops, bars, and amenities of Tottenham as well as the multiple transport links via Seven Sisters.

listing.description: This well presented 1930s Family house affords a prime position close to the award winning Downhills Park. The property arrives onto the market for the first time in over 30 years and is offered for sale in good order throughout with light and airy accommodation and superb entertaining space.Spanning 1152 sq ft the property comprises: Hallway, large through lounge leading to a superb kitchen breakfast room. The first floor enjoys three bedrooms, a family bathroom and access to a large boarded loft space which could easily be converted into additional rooms and a further shower/bathroom (subject to planning permission). The garden is west facing with a nice patio and lawn. There is access to a garage.Fabulous location in N17 with convenient access to Turnpike Lane Underground St (Piccadilly Line) and Seven Sisters br- Underground (Victoria Line). The property is in the catchment areas for some of the area's most favoured nurseries and schools. The award winning Downhills park(1 min walk over the road) offers a superb community cafe', tennis courts, children's play area and well-manicured open lawns.Please contact the sales team at Winkworth Harringay to arrange an appointment to view Your local independently owned property agency61 London offices including a North London network covering -Islington-Highbury-Finsbury Park-Stroud Green-Crouch End-Highgate-Harringay-Tottenham&Seven Sisters-Turnpike Lane-Wood Green-Bounds Green-Palmers Green-Hackney
listing.short_description: An attractive Three bedroom 1930s family house with garage. Moments from the award winning Downhills Park and just a short walk to Turnpike Lane Station.  Sole Agent

listing.description: Castles present this stunning 'newly refurbished' mid-terraced family house for sale. Features include: Two reception rooms that create one great living space, newly fitted kitchen/diner with integrated appliances and double doors opening out onto the landscaped garden. Upstairs you have three double bedrooms and a newly fitted contemporary bathroom. The property is situated on a highly-favoured road and offers great access for a variety of transport links: Seven Sisters, Tottenham Hale and Bruce Grove are all convenient to reach. Available with no onward chain.
listing.short_description: Castles present this stunning 'newly refurbished' mid-terraced family house for sale. Features include: Two reception rooms that create one great living space, newly fitted kitchen/diner with integrated appliances and double doors opening out onto the landscaped garden.
